author: Matt Breen
headline: HURRY! Nintendo Switch OLED restock update – Neon Blue/Neon Red model still in stock at Amazon
body:
Other retailers are out of Nintendo Switch OLED stock, but Amazon still has the Neon Blue/Neon Red version – for now.
                  And the price keeps on changing – honestly, we can’t keep up.
                  
                    ...
